message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $13500 for the product. This offer includes all the features you're looking for and more. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further details.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my costs down. I would like to counterpropose a price of $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. While I would love to accommodate you, the product has a significant value to us as well. I propose a price of $13000 for the product, which I believe strikes a fair balance between our interests. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I am still looking to keep my expenses low. I would like to counterpropose a price of $12500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle of our interests.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial price. After careful consideration, I am willing to consider $12750 as a final offer for the product. This price reflects the value we place on it while also accommodating your budgetary concerns. I hope this proposal works for you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budgetary constraints, I would like to counterpropose a price of $12500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I've given it careful thought and am willing to accept $12625 as the final price for the product. This reflects a compromise that values both our interests and accommodates your budgetary considerations. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in finding a compromise. Considering the value I place on the product and my budgetary needs, I would like to counterpropose a price of $12500 for the product. I hope this aligns with your valuation.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I've considered your position carefully and am willing to accept $12575 as the final price for the product. This reflects a compromise that respects both our interests and accommodates your budgetary needs. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
